summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6047 for the improvement of 46th Avenue Southwest from West Thistle Street to West Cloverdale Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 82252, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
